comment.body:
>I'm not being racist here

Was wondering if it was a Swiss, apparently not ;)



By the way, don't worry about being called a racist, no individual within ones race is equal, nor are individual races equal. Nowadays, preferring your own race is labeled as 'racism' but 'racism' used to mean hatred for other races, also the term is (likely) popularized by Leon Trotsky.

@Colkurtz: It's a sad fact that the vast majority know of the Holocaust but know nothing about the Armenian genocide, Russian genocide (Bolshevik revolution, communism), Ukrainian genocide (Holodomor), German genocide (death of millions of Germans post-war, and locked up in Eisenhower's death camps left to die), Chinese genocide ("Great Leap Forward"), oh and the millions of North Koreans who died by being locked up in death camps (>200,000 at any given point in time) to be tortured, starved, worked to death.
